scripts.rebuild: git pull origin master && docker-compose up -d --build
scripts.deploy: git pull origin master && rsync -av --delete --exclude --ignore-errors '.git'  --exclude 'node_modules' ../netlifycms-example/ admin@178.62.234.100:/srv/www/netlifycms-example && ssh admin@178.62.234.100 'cd /srv/www/netlifycms-example; docker-compose up -d --build'
